attributes.action: Ban cold calling and unsolicited leafleting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to a Trading Standards survey, 96% of the general public want cold calling banned. 
We do.
Cold calling is linked with crime, and we can buy everything they offer via the internet anyway.
We would like unsolicited leafleting banned as well as it is environmentally unfriendly, and costs us money & time to get rid of through increased council tax charges for waste services.
